item.title: TDC Innovation - Golang in Digital Surgery and Integration with Medical Devices
item.description: What it’s about Slides from the TDC Innovation 2021 edition. On this talk I touched some topics related Digital Surgery and Medical Devices Integration. It explains how we created a FHIR, DICOM and HL7 ADT Integration using plain Go protocols and resources. The source code can be found here
